title: [Unified checkpoint] Add unified optimizer
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
New features

### PR changes
Others

### Description

Add unified optimizer which merge tp tensor, and save all optimizers into `optimizer.safetensors.index.json` and `master_weights.safetensors.index.json` if exists.

- eg. for tp4pp2, 
- it will save `optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors ~ optimizer-00008-of-00008.safetensors`
- it will save `master_weights-00001-of-00008.safetensors ~ master_weights-00008-of-00008.safetensors` if exists
- `00001-00004` store all tensor for pp00, `00005-00008` store all tensor for pp01
-  each of `00001-00004`  are tensor merge on tensor parallel, and equally split into 4 parts.

#### Current save state
``` python
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1015 Nov 21 16:40 config.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.1G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00001-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.2G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00002-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.2G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00003-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.2G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00004-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.1G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00005-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.2G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00006-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.1G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00007-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3.3G Nov 21 16:40 master_weights-00008-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  28K Nov 21 16:40 master_weights.safetensors.index.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00001-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00002-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00003-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00004-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00005-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00006-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.6G Nov 21 16:40 model-00007-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1.7G Nov 21 16:40 model-00008-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  25K Nov 21 16:40 model.safetensors.index.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.2G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.4G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00002-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.2G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00003-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.4G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00004-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.3G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00005-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.4G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00006-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.3G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00007-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 6.4G Nov 21 16:40 optimizer-00008-of-00008.safetensors
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 118K Nov 21 16:40 optimizer.safetensors.index.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  55K Nov 21 16:40 rng_state_8.pth
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  317 Nov 21 16:40 scaler.pdparams
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   50 Nov 21 16:40 scheduler.pdparams
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 489K Nov 21 16:40 sentencepiece.bpe.model
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   63 Nov 21 16:40 special_tokens_map.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  207 Nov 21 16:40 tokenizer_config.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  596 Nov 21 16:40 trainer_state.json
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2.2K Nov 21 16:40 training_args.bin
```

#### Optimizer name design

To improve the readability of optimizer parameters, we renamed the keys of the optimizer parameters. The original optimizer parameters mainly contains static name, for example:
- `embedding_0.w_0_fp32_master_0_moment1_0`
- `embedding_0.w_0_fp32_master_0_beta1_pow_acc_0`
- `linear_0.w_0_fp32_master0_moment1_0`

Instead, we get the structure name and specific tensor name, and build the new optimizer key names, for example:
- `embedding.tokens.weight/moment1_0`
- `embedding.tokens.weight/beta1_pow_acc_0`
- `llama.layers.0.self_attn.q_proj.weight/moment1_0`

Here we paste part of `optimizer.safetensors.index.json`:
``` 
{
    "metadata": {
        "total_size": 53907327256
    },   
    "weight_map": {
        "llama.embed_tokens.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.self_attn.q_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.self_attn.k_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.self_attn.v_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.self_attn.o_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.mlp.gate_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.mlp.up_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.mlp.down_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.input_layernorm.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.0.post_attention_layernorm.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.self_attn.q_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.self_attn.k_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.self_attn.v_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.self_attn.o_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.mlp.gate_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.mlp.up_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.mlp.down_proj.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.input_layernorm.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        "llama.layers.1.post_attention_layernorm.weight/moment1_0": "optimizer-00001-of-00008.safetensors",
        ...
    },
   "master_weights": true
}
```

title: [AutoParallel] add pipeline.auto_parallel_profiler to auto_config
body: ### PR types New features ### PR changes Others ### Description 在 PR https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/58313 中为Paddle添加了可视化静态图模式下流水并行时序图的功能，本 PR 将 pipeline.auto_parallel_profiler 添加上 auto_config 中使得用户可以通过命令行参数启动该功能； #### GPT-3 测试用例 运行示例： ```shell log_dir=log_auto_6.7B_mp2pp4_st rm -rf $log_dir export FLAGS_embedding_deterministic=1 export FLAGS_cudnn_deterministic=1 #nsys profile --stats=true -t cuda,nvtx -o 6.7B_st --capture-range=cudaProfilerApi --force-overwrite true \ python -m paddle.distributed.launch --log_dir $log_dir --devices "0,1,2,3" \ ./tools/auto.py \ -c ./ppfleetx/configs/nlp/gpt/auto/pretrain_gpt_1.3B_dp8.yaml \ -o Global.local_batch_size=4 \ -o Global.micro_batch_size=1 \ -o Engine.max_steps=50 \ -o Engine.logging_freq=10 \ -o Engine.eval_freq=100 \ -o Engine.save_load.save_steps=1000 \ -o Model.use_recompute=True \ -o Model.hidden_dropout_prob=0 \ -o Model.attention_probs_dropout_prob=0 \ -o Model.hidden_size=512 \ -o Distributed.pipeline.schedule_mode=FThenB \ -o Distributed.pipeline.auto_parallel_profiler=1 \ -o Distributed.dp_degree=1 \ -o Distributed.mp_degree=2 \ -o Distributed.pp_degree=2 \ -o Distributed.sharding.sharding_degree=1 \ -o Distributed.sharding.sharding_stage=1 \ -o Profiler_auto.memory_stats=True \ -o Engine.verbose=3 \ -o Model.hidden_dropout_prob=0 \ -o Model.attention_probs_dropout_prob=0 \ ``` 其中 `Distributed.pipeline.auto_parallel_profiler=1` 为开启语句。 后续使用解析脚本生成json文件： ```bash python python/paddle/distributed/auto_parallel/static/profiler_helper_static.py --devices 0,1,2,3 --log_dir /home/root/PaddleNLP/model_zoo/gpt-3/log_auto_6.7B_mp2pp4_st/ ``` ![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/55493212/6520cc22-acdf-43fb-9a73-72428cb34dc7) 在 [https://ui.d.dev/](https://ui.d.dev/) 中打开 pipeline_profile_perfetto.json 效果如下： ![image](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/assets/55493212/449ec55c-a31d-46f1-bd5b-bc89e5a2bcf2) #### Llama2 测试用例 ``` task_name="llama_7b_pp2_mp4_st" rm -rf output/$task_name/ rm -rf "output/$task_name""_log" export SOT_LOG_LEVEL=4 export PYTHONPATH=../../:$PYTHONPATH export FLAGS_embedding_deterministic=1 export FLAGS_cudnn_deterministic=1 export CUDA_DEVICE_MAX_CONNECTIONS=1 python -u -m paddle.distributed.launch \ --gpus "0,1,2,3" \ --log_dir "output/$task_name""_log" \ run_pretrain_auto.py \ --model_type "llama" \ --model_name_or_path "meta-llama/Llama-2-7b" \ --tokenizer_name_or_path "meta-llama/Llama-2-7b" \ --input_dir "./data" \ --output_dir "output/$task_name" \ --split 949,50,1 \ --max_seq_length 2048 \ --per_device_train_batch_size 1 \ --per_device_eval_batch_size 1 \ --gradient_accumulation_steps 4 \ --use_flash_attention 0 \ --use_fused_rms_norm 0 \ --fp16 0 \ --fp16_opt_level "O2" \ --scale_loss 1024 \ --pipeline_parallel_degree 4 \ --tensor_parallel_degree 1 \ --sharding_parallel_degree 1 \ --sharding "stage1" \ --learning_rate 0.0001 \ --min_learning_rate 0.00001 \ --max_steps 10 \ --save_steps 5000 \ --weight_decay 0.01 \ --warmup_ratio 0.01 \ --max_grad_norm 1.0 \ --logging_steps 1\ --dataloader_num_workers 1 \ --sharding "" \ --eval_steps 1000 \ --report_to "visualdl" \ --disable_tqdm true \ --continue_training 0\ --recompute 1 \ --do_train \ --do_eval 0 \ --device "gpu" \ --data_impl "mmap" \ --parallel_mode "auto" \ --job_schedule_profiler_start 0 \ --job_schedule_profiler_end 5 \ ``` 可视化结果： ``` python python/paddle/distributed/auto_parallel/static/profiler_helper_static.py --devices 0,1,2,3 --log_dir /home/workspace/PaddleNLP/llm/llama/output/llama_7b_pp2_mp4_st_log ``` 依赖 pr： - title: 【黑客松】SGPT复现工作代码
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

```
# Copyright (c) 2023 PaddlePaddle Authors. All Rights Reserved.
#
# Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
# you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
# You may obtain a copy of the License at
#
#     http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
#
# Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
# distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
# WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

import argparse
from collections import OrderedDict

import paddle
import torch

dont_transpose = [
    "layernorm.weight",
    "_embeddings.weight",
]


def convert_pytorch_checkpoint_to_paddle(pytorch_checkpoint_path: str, paddle_dump_path: str):
    pytorch_state_dict = torch.load(pytorch_checkpoint_path, map_location="cpu")
    paddle_state_dict = OrderedDict()
    for k, v in pytorch_state_dict.items():
        transpose = False
        if k[-7:] == ".weight":
            if not any([w in k for w in dont_transpose]):
                if v.ndim == 2:
                    v = v.transpose(0, 1)
                    transpose = True
        print(f"Converting: {k} | is_transpose {transpose}")

        paddle_state_dict[k] = v.data.numpy()

    paddle.save(paddle_state_dict, paddle_dump_path)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
    parser.add_argument(
        "--pytorch_checkpoint_path",
        default="chatglm-6b",
        type=str,
        required=False,
        help="Path to the Pytorch checkpoint path.",
    )
    parser.add_argument(
        "--paddle_dump_path",
        default="paddle/chatglm-6b/model_state.pdparams",
        type=str,
        required=False,
        help="Path to the output Paddle model.",
    )
    args = parser.parse_args()
    convert_pytorch_checkpoint_to_paddle(args.pytorch_checkpoint_path, args.paddle_dump_path)
```

title: [AutoParallel] Sequence Parallel for Auto Mode
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
Function optimization

### PR changes
Models

### Description
Sequence Parallel for Auto Mode
受限于当前标记补全模块的问题，有3处地方的标记不够直观，未来可以更完善：

1. 用户接口处暂不支持 SP 独立维度和通信组，SP 绑定 TP (和动态图 config 对齐)
2. row linear matmul 的标记： shard_op 不支持 linear 等(module)，此处的标记需要调用paddle framework 内部函数
3. transfermer layer input 的标记： SP 标记需要考虑DP 的标记防止冲突，出于较保守精度对齐考虑的，DP 在跨mesh 时需要重新标记但这影响了SP 信息的 propagation

title: support multiple loss average/broadcast
body:
# 功能更新： 当网络返回多个loss时，对各个loss做相应的 average、broadcast 并打印。

假设模型的loss计算如下：
```python
tensor_c = tensor_a + tensor_b
```
当网络需要返回多个loss的时候，网络的输出如下：

```python
{
    "loss": {"loss1": tensor_a, "loss2", tensor_b, "loss3", "loss": tensor_c},
    "logits": xxx
}
```

```python
{
    "loss": "tensor_a",
    "loss2": "tensor_b",
    "logits": xxx
}
```
 
 
这个时候框架会优化`"loss"` 对应的tensor ，并对其余tensor，进行累计、打印。

这个功能有网络返回 dict 结构时生效，对其他情况没有影响。

> TODO: 目前evaluate时，只打印`"loss"`，其余字段会忽略，后续支持多loss。

title: [PIR][Prim] support PIR train
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
New features

### PR changes
Others

### Description
Support PIR train.
please train like this:
```
export FLAGS_cudnn_deterministic=1
export FLAGS_prim_all=true
export FLAGS_enable_pir_api=True

if [ ! -d ./data ]
then
    mkdir ./data
    cd ./data
    wget https://bj.bcebos.com/paddlenlp/models/transformers/llama/data/llama_openwebtext_100k_ids.npy
    wget https://bj.bcebos.com/paddlenlp/models/transformers/llama/data/llama_openwebtext_100k_idx.npz
    cd ..
fi

python train_pir.py \
    -c ../../ppfleetx/configs/nlp/gpt/pretrain_gpt_345M_single_card.yaml \
    -o Global.micro_batch_size=2 \
    -o Global.local_batch_size=2 \
    -o Global.to_static=True \
    -o Engine.max_steps=5000
```

title: [llm]support chatglmv2 in fined FT
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Others
### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others
### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

用户可用下面命令执行细粒度组网的动态图推理，

`python3.8 predictor.py     --model_name_or_path /root/.paddlenlp/models/THUDM/chatglm2-6b     --batch_size 2 --dtype "float16"     --mode "dynamic"  --inference_model `


可用下面命令导出fp16静态图

`python3.8  export_model.py      --model_name_or_path /root/.paddlenlp/models/THUDM/chatglm2-6b      --output_path /zhoukangkang/2023-06-06minigpt/whole_part/chatglmv2_by_zkk_infer_cuda11_2/      --dtype float16 --inference_model  --model_prefix=chatglm_v2 `


可用下面命令导出weight only int8静态图

`python3.8  export_model.py      --model_name_or_path /root/.paddlenlp/models/THUDM/chatglm2-6b      --output_path /zhoukangkang/2023-06-06minigpt/whole_part/chatglmv2_by_zkk_infer_cuda11_2_int8/      --dtype float16 --inference_model  --model_prefix=chatglm_v2  --quant_type=weight_only_int8  `

title: [New features] Add chat template for training
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
chat-templte 支持训练自定义， 依赖：https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/7219

qwen 模型训练：

```json
{
    "model_name_or_path": "qwen/qwen-7b-chat",
    "dataset_name_or_path": "./data",
    "output_dir": "./checkpoints/qwen_lora_ckpts",
    "per_device_train_batch_size": 4,
    "gradient_accumulation_steps": 4,
    "per_device_eval_batch_size": 8,
    "eval_accumulation_steps":16,
    "num_train_epochs": 3,
    "learning_rate": 3e-04,
    "warmup_steps": 30,
    "logging_steps": 1,
    "evaluation_strategy": "epoch",
    "save_strategy": "epoch",
    "src_length": 1024,
    "max_length": 2048,
    "bf16": true,
    "fp16_opt_level": "O2",
    "do_train": true,
    "do_eval": true,
    "disable_tqdm": true,
    "load_best_model_at_end": true,
    "eval_with_do_generation": false,
    "metric_for_best_model": "accuracy",
    "recompute": true,
    "save_total_limit": 1,
    "tensor_parallel_degree": 1,
    "pipeline_parallel_degree": 1,
    "lora": true,
    "use_chat_template": true
  }
```

qwen 的多轮对话精调过程中，system, user-query, special-tokens 都是看不到的，所以为了支持： https://github.com/QwenLM/Qwen/blob/main/finetune.py#L141  原生数据构造的方式，将 qwen 的 chat-template 的数据构造方式转化成以下格式即可与其对齐。

```json
{
    "system": "You are a helpful assistant.",
    "conversation": ["\n<|im_start|>user\n{{user}}<|im_end|>\n<|im_start|>assistant\n", "{{bot}}<|im_end|>"],
    "query": "\n<|im_start|>user\n{{query}}<|im_end|>\n<|im_start|>assistant\n"
}
```

执行命令：

```shell
python finetune_generation.py qwen/lora_argument.json
```



## TODOS

- [ ] 支持在推理阶段按照对话轮次为单位来进行截断

title: [Trainer]Add  unified checkpoint for hybrid parallel.
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
New features

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Trainer

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->

Add unified checkpoint which merge tp tensor, and save all model weights to ` model.safetensors.index.json`.
- eg. for tp4pp2, 
- it will save `model-00001-of-00008.safetensors ~ model-00008-of-00008.safetensors`
- `00001-00004` store all tensor for pp00, `00005-00008` store all tensor for pp01
-  each of `00001-00004`  are tensor merge on tensor parallel, and equally part to 4 parts.

others: add `distributed_isfile`  and `distributed_file`  to copy some small files to other machine nodes.

TODO: 
- Support optimizer broadcast for dp.
